sentence: And for good reason: GOP gubernatorial candidate state Sen. Doug Mastriano abruptly ended a podcast interview with Delaware Valley Journal, angry over questions about his participation in a rally linked to QAnon conspiracy advocates.
title: New F&M Poll Has John Fetterman (D) Increasing His Lead In The Democratic Primary

sentence: Former President Donald Trump endorsed Pennsylvania's Republican gubernatorial hopeful Doug Mastriano on Saturday, just days before he faces off against GOP opponents in the state's primary on Tuesday.
author: Jason Lemon
title: Trump-Endorsed Doug Mastriano's Chances of Beating GOP Rivals: Polls

sentence: Aligning with Trump's endorsements would mean voting for Doug Mastriano and Dr. Oz.
author: Guy Benson
title: Place Your Bets: Who Wins the Heated GOP Senate Primary in Pennsylvania Tonight?
